content:
Based on the execution logs, I'll generate a report summarizing the existing structures and error tips.

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of three stone furnaces in a row:
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 3 at position (4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces are working and processing copper ore into copper plates

### Copper Cable Assembly Line
Located around position (9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Wooden chest at (6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) crafting copper cables
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving items from assembler to storage
- Storage chest at (12.5, 11.5) containing mixed resources

### Storage Area
Series of wooden chests:
- Chest at (14.5, 11.5) storing iron plates (full)
- Chest at (16.5, 11.5) storing copper plates

### Power Generation System
Located around position (-7.0, 24.5):
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) producing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5)
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Science Pack System
Located around position (0.5, 30.5):
- Lab with automation and logistic science packs
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) feeding the lab
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues
- Ensure boiler has constant fuel supply to prevent "out of fuel" warnings
- Connect steam engine to power network to resolve "not connected" warnings
- Maintain proper fluid connections between boiler and steam engine

### Assembly Machine Issues
- Ensure consistent supply of copper plates to prevent "missing resources" errors
- Monitor power supply to prevent "not receiving electricity" warnings

### Inventory Management
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items to prevent "No [item] to insert" errors
- Monitor chest capacity to prevent "chest is full" warnings

### Research Issues
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again

### Production Efficiency
- Clear blocked items from ground regularly to maintain production flow
- Ensure proper fuel distribution to all burner inserters
